import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function Navbar() { const [show,setShow]=useState(false); //setShow is used to update the const scrollHandler =()=>{ if(window.scrollY>100) { setShow(true); } else{ setShow(false); } } useEffect(()=>{ window.addEventListener('scroll', scrollHandler); return ()=>{ window.removeEventListener('scroll', scrollHandler); } },[]); return (
Home TV Shows Movies New & Popular My List Browse by Languages

Children

); } export default Navbar;
